result.title: Solution to e-olymp problem 5852
result.content:
I have been trying this e-olymp ( https://www.e-olymp.com/en/problems/5852 ) problem lately. I got an O(n^2k) dp solution for it but I am not able to figure out whether a bridge is forming a tunnel or not(It is valid or not). Can anyone please help me with it.

sorry for bad English
